subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Education (K-12)
Sports Injuries
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dr. Paul Butler created a stir when he suggested ending football at Dover High School in New Hampshire, citing evidence of the peril the sport poses to the brains of players.
snippet: Dr. Paul Butler created a stir when he suggested ending football at Dover High School in New Hampshire, citing evidence of the peril the sport poses to the brains of players.
